item.title: Kraken Cuntinues Acqusition Spree, Buys Dutch Bitcoin Exchange CleverCoin | Finance Magnates
item.description:
Kraken Cuntinues Acqusition Spree, Buys Dutch Bitcoin Exchange CleverCoin | Finance Magnates

Kraken, already one of the largest cryptocurrency trading venues in the world, has taken over yet another bitcoin exchange - Netherlands-based CleverCoin. This comes less than six months after Kraken acquired both Coinsetter and Cavirtex and entered the US and Canadian markets.

item.title: Technical Analysis: Light at End of Tunnel for Bitcoin Price
item.description:
Technical Analysis: Light at End of Tunnel for Bitcoin Price

The bitcoin price has accomplished its first technical cycle, and a congestion area could institute a trading box for the next 3 months, depending on fundamentals, political factors and news before a new rise to the annual objective near $1800 USD. Also read: Bitcoin and Brexit: Did the Great UK Debate Move the Price?

item.title: Office 365 Zero-day Leads To Ransomware Phishing Attacks
item.description:
Office 365 Zero-day Leads To Ransomware Phishing Attacks

Sometimes it feels like the only way Bitcoin makes headlines is either through a price change or ransomware. Cerber, one of the most dangerous types of Bitcoin ransomware alive today, has been cloned into a new variant. As a result, this undisclosed type of malware can target Office 365 users through a zero-day attack.

item.title: Kraken Boosts Bitcoin Liqudiity Through Clevercoin Acquisition
item.description:
Kraken Boosts Bitcoin Liqudiity Through Clevercoin Acquisition

The Bitcoin price has been on the rise throughout recent weeks, and it looks like future increases could be on the horizon. Kraken wants to be the go-to platform for European and international Bitcoin enthusiasts. Bitcoin exchanges are always looking to expand their Reach. Kraken, one of Europe's leading exchange platforms, acquired Dutch company CleverCoin.

item.title: Bitcoin 'More Stable Than Euro and Pound' After Record Brexit Trading
item.description:
Bitcoin 'More Stable Than Euro and Pound' After Record Brexit Trading

Bitcoin has gained stability and credibility following increased use in the aftermath of the UK Brexit vote, with record trading levels set. Also read: Reggie Middleton: 'The Problem is Not Brexit. It's the Euro' Contrary to the UK pound sterling, which dropped 10 percent after the results to a 31-year low against the dollar, and the euro's 3% slide, Bitcoin reached a high of $683 per unit.

item.title: Why didn't some academic from a top university come up with bitcoin / blockchain?
item.description:
Why didn't some academic from a top university come up with bitcoin / blockchain?

Answer (1 of 3): The main method of conveying ideas in an academic setting is through papers. If the Bitcoin white paper were to be submitted to any serious academic conference/journal it would most likely have been rejected. Why? Because Bitcoin borrows ideas from several disciplines, making it...

item.title: $22 million worth of Bitcoin sold in Australian-first auction
item.description:
$22 million worth of Bitcoin sold in Australian-first auction

Ernst & Young revealed today that it has successfully auctioned off 24,518 bitcoins worth around A$22 million ($16 million) as part of a scheduled auction after the Australian government confiscated the bitcoins from a Silk Road user.

item.title: How do I earn money using bitcoins?
item.description:
How do I earn money using bitcoins?

From above, it looks like the landing site of an enormous UFO.. â€‹ What is it? The Mir Diamond Mine. Location: Siberia, Russian Federation. Why it's cool? Because it's the world's largest open-pit kimberlite diamond mine. Discovered and built in 1957 by the USSR at 525 m deep and 1,200 m wide, this hole is too large it creates its own weather.

item.title: Bitcoin to Gain Ethereum's Functionality Through Counterparty, Launch by Autumn
item.description:
Bitcoin to Gain Ethereum's Functionality Through Counterparty, Launch by Autumn

Counterparty is to launch Ethereum's Virtual Machine on testnet in two weeks, with a mainnet launch estimated around Autumn 2016, bringing Ethereum's smart contract functionality to Bitcoin. Counterparty's EVM is 99% the same as Ethereum's, according to sources, and has 85% test coverage, higher than Ethereum's python core library, Pyethereum, according to a press release.

item.title: China's Proposed New Law Recognizes Bitcoin as 'People's Rights'
item.description:
China's Proposed New Law Recognizes Bitcoin as 'People's Rights'

Virtual properties and data, including digital currencies, could be officially "People's Rights" in China, following the publication of a new Civil Code General Provisions Draft. This gives citizens greater legal protection over non-physical property.
